ygData.subject: SharpNEAT: Support for feed-forward nets
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI evolution of feed-forward nets is now supported and enabled by default for all digital logic based experiments (XOR, Binary multiplexer experiments) and

Subject: SharpNEAT: Support for feed-forward nets
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=344770077; y=aScoXoyojjAw9FuhU4p4ADY7F8IMaHCKrZq5hK2xld6agz84UWUD
X-Yahoo-Profile: alienseedpod

FYI evolution of feed-forward nets is now supported and enabled by
default for all digital logic based experiments (XOR, Binary
multiplexer experiments) and function regression.
Further work is required to decode the networks into a feed-forward
only neural network implementation to allow for unlimited network
depth and more efficient execution, and also to use feedforward nets
within HyperNEAT/CPPNs.

Currently this is available via the SVN repository only.

Colin
